# Movie Explorer Project - Instructions

## Project Overview
Next.js Movie Explorer application with TypeScript, TMDB API integration, and favorites management.


## Technical Stack
- Next.js 14+ with App Router
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- TMDB API (proxied through Next.js API routes)
- LocalStorage for favorites persistence

## Key Requirements
- Search movies by title
- View detailed movie information
- Save favorites with ratings (1-5) and notes
- Client-side persistence with LocalStorage
- Server-side API proxy to protect API keys
- Error handling for all edge cases
